org.projectnyx

Class Nyx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projectnyx.Nyx

  • public class Nyx
extends Object

    Singleton central object of the whole server.

    • Method Detail

      • addShutdownTask

        public void addShutdownTask(Runnable runnable)

        Adds a Runnable task that will be run after the last server tick is completed.

        Parameters:
        runnable - the task to run

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()

        Causes the current server tick to be the last tick that runs, followed by running the shutdownTasks.

        This method will not block until the last server tick is completed. Actually, this method should only be triggered from the main thread, i.e. from a server tick.

      • builder

        public static Nyx.NyxBuilder builder()

      • getInstance

        public static Nyx getInstance()
        The singleton instance of Nyx

      • getModulePath

        public File getModulePath()

        The directory where JAR module files are loaded

        Can be specified from command line using the -m (--module-path) option.

      • getDataPath

        public File getDataPath()

        The parent directory of all simple loaded and saved data of this server instance.

        Can be specified from command line using the -d (--data-path) option.

        Developers who clone this project should set this path to an outside directory or one of the files listed in .gitignore. The /data/ entry was designated for this use.

      • getLog

        public org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger getLog()

        The log4j2 logger for this server

      • getConfig

        The loaded nyx.xml config file

      • getTicker

        public Ticker getTicker()

        Ticker is the server's core pacemaker. Manages the main loop that keeps the server on.

      • getNetwork

        The NetworkManager for this server.
